getRoot.title: List api root resources
getRoot.description: Get links to all other resources available in the API.

getActivityFeedChimpChatter.title: Get latest chimp chatter
getActivityFeedChimpChatter.description: Return the Chimp Chatter for this account ordered by most recent.

getAuthorizedApps.title: List authorized apps
getAuthorizedApps.description: Get a list of an account's registered, connected applications.

getAuthorizedAppsId.title: Get authorized app info
getAuthorizedAppsId.description: Get information about a specific authorized application.

getAutomations.title: List automations
getAutomations.description: Get a summary of an account's Automations.

postAutomations.title: Add automation
postAutomations.description: Create a new Automation in your Mailchimp account.

getAutomationsId.title: Get automation info
getAutomationsId.description: Get a summary of an individual Automation workflow's settings and content. The `trigger_settings` object returns information for the first email in the workflow.

postAutomationsIdActionsPauseAllEmails.title: Pause automation emails
postAutomationsIdActionsPauseAllEmails.description: Pause all emails in a specific Automation workflow.

postAutomationsIdActionsStartAllEmails.title: Start automation emails
postAutomationsIdActionsStartAllEmails.description: Start all emails in an Automation workflow.

archiveAutomations.title: Archive automation
archiveAutomations.description: Archiving will permanently end your automation and keep the report data. You'll be able to replicate your archived automation, but you can't restart it.

getAutomationsIdEmails.title: List automated emails
getAutomationsIdEmails.description: Get a summary of the emails in an Automation workflow.

getAutomationsIdEmailsId.title: Get workflow email info
getAutomationsIdEmailsId.description: Get information about an individual Automation workflow email.

deleteAutomationsIdEmailsId.title: Delete workflow email
deleteAutomationsIdEmailsId.description: Removes an individual Automation workflow email. Emails from certain workflow types, including the Abandoned Cart Email (abandonedCart) and Product Retargeting Email (abandonedBrowse) Workflows, cannot be deleted.

patchAutomationEmailWorkflowId.title: Update workflow email
patchAutomationEmailWorkflowId.description: Update settings for a Automation workflow email

getAutomationsIdEmailsIdQueue.title: List automated email subscribers
getAutomationsIdEmailsIdQueue.description: Get information about an Automation email queue.

postAutomationsIdEmailsIdQueue.title: Add subscriber to workflow email
postAutomationsIdEmailsIdQueue.description: Manually add a subscriber to a workflow, bypassing the default trigger settings. You can also use this endpoint to trigger a series of automated emails in an API 3.0 workflow type.

getAutomationsIdEmailsIdQueueId.title: Get automated email subscriber
getAutomationsIdEmailsIdQueueId.description: Get information about a specific subscriber in an Automation email queue.

getAutomationsIdRemovedSubscribers.title: List subscribers removed from workflow
getAutomationsIdRemovedSubscribers.description: Get information about subscribers who were removed from an Automation workflow.

postAutomationsIdRemovedSubscribers.title: Remove subscriber from workflow
postAutomationsIdRemovedSubscribers.description: Remove a subscriber from a specific Automation workflow. You can remove a subscriber at any point in an Automation workflow, regardless of how many emails they've been sent from that workflow. Once they're removed, they can never be added back to the same workflow.

getAutomationsIdRemovedSubscribersId.title: Get subscriber removed from workflow
getAutomationsIdRemovedSubscribersId.description: Get information about a specific subscriber who was removed from an Automation workflow.

getBatches.title: List batch requests
getBatches.description: Get a summary of batch requests that have been made.

postBatches.title: Start batch operation
postBatches.description: Begin processing a batch operations request.

getBatchesId.title: Get batch operation status
getBatchesId.description: Get the status of a batch request.

deleteBatchesId.title: Delete batch request
deleteBatchesId.description: Stops a batch request from running. Since only one batch request is run at a time, this can be used to cancel a long running request. The results of any completed operations will not be available after this call.

getBatchWebhooks.title: List batch webhooks
getBatchWebhooks.description: Get all webhooks that have been configured for batches.

postBatchWebhooks.title: Add batch webhook
postBatchWebhooks.description: Configure a webhook that will fire whenever any batch request completes processing.

getBatchWebhook.title: Get batch webhook info
getBatchWebhook.description: Get information about a specific batch webhook.

patchBatchWebhooks.title: Update batch webhook
patchBatchWebhooks.description: Update a webhook that will fire whenever any batch request completes processing.

deleteBatchWebhookId.title: Delete batch webhook
deleteBatchWebhookId.description: Remove a batch webhook. Webhooks will no longer be sent to the given URL.

getTemplateFolders.title: List template folders
getTemplateFolders.description: Get all folders used to organize templates.

getTemplateFoldersId.title: Get template folder
getTemplateFoldersId.description: Get information about a specific folder used to organize templates.

patchTemplateFoldersId.title: Update template folder
patchTemplateFoldersId.description: Update a specific folder used to organize templates.

deleteTemplateFoldersId.title: Delete template folder
deleteTemplateFoldersId.description: Delete a specific template folder, and mark all the templates in the folder as 'unfiled'.

getCampaignFolders.title: List campaign folders
getCampaignFolders.description: Get all folders used to organize campaigns.

getCampaignFoldersId.title: Get campaign folder
getCampaignFoldersId.description: Get information about a specific folder used to organize campaigns.

patchCampaignFoldersId.title: Update campaign folder
patchCampaignFoldersId.description: Update a specific folder used to organize campaigns.

deleteCampaignFoldersId.title: Delete campaign folder
deleteCampaignFoldersId.description: Delete a specific campaign folder, and mark all the campaigns in the folder as 'unfiled'.

getCampaigns.title: List campaigns
getCampaigns.description: Get all campaigns in an account.

getCampaignsId.title: Get campaign info
getCampaignsId.description: Get information about a specific campaign.

patchCampaignsId.title: Update campaign settings
patchCampaignsId.description: Update some or all of the settings for a specific campaign.

deleteCampaignsId.title: Delete campaign
deleteCampaignsId.description: Remove a campaign from your Mailchimp account.

postCampaignsIdActionsCancelSend.title: Cancel campaign
postCampaignsIdActionsCancelSend.description: Cancel a Regular or Plain-Text Campaign after you send, before all of your recipients receive it. This feature is included with Mailchimp Pro.

postCampaignsIdActionsReplicate.title: Replicate campaign
postCampaignsIdActionsReplicate.description: Replicate a campaign in saved or send status.

postCampaignsIdActionsSend.title: Send campaign
postCampaignsIdActionsSend.description: Send a Mailchimp campaign. For RSS Campaigns, the campaign will send according to its schedule. All other campaigns will send immediately.

postCampaignsIdActionsSchedule.title: Schedule campaign
postCampaignsIdActionsSchedule.description: Schedule a campaign for delivery. If you're using Multivariate Campaigns to test send times or sending RSS Campaigns, use the send action instead.

postCampaignsIdActionsUnschedule.title: Unschedule campaign
postCampaignsIdActionsUnschedule.description: Unschedule a scheduled campaign that hasn't started sending.

postCampaignsIdActionsCreateResend.title: Resend campaign
postCampaignsIdActionsCreateResend.description: Creates a Resend to Non-Openers version of this campaign. We will also check if this campaign meets the criteria for Resend to Non-Openers campaigns.

getCampaignsIdContent.title: Get campaign content
getCampaignsIdContent.description: Get the the HTML and plain-text content for a campaign.

putCampaignsIdContent.title: Set campaign content
putCampaignsIdContent.description: Set the content for a campaign.

getCampaignsIdFeedback.title: List campaign feedback
getCampaignsIdFeedback.description: Get team feedback while you're working together on a Mailchimp campaign.

postCampaignsIdFeedback.title: Add campaign feedback
postCampaignsIdFeedback.description: Add feedback on a specific campaign.

getCampaignsIdFeedbackId.title: Get campaign feedback message
getCampaignsIdFeedbackId.description: Get a specific feedback message from a campaign.

patchCampaignsIdFeedbackId.title: Update campaign feedback message
patchCampaignsIdFeedbackId.description: Update a specific feedback message for a campaign.

deleteCampaignsIdFeedbackId.title: Delete campaign feedback message
deleteCampaignsIdFeedbackId.description: Remove a specific feedback message for a campaign.

getCampaignsIdSendChecklist.title: Get campaign send checklist
getCampaignsIdSendChecklist.description: Review the send checklist for a campaign, and resolve any issues before sending.

getConnectedSites.title: List connected sites
getConnectedSites.description: Get all connected sites in an account.

postConnectedSites.title: Add connected site
postConnectedSites.description: Create a new Mailchimp connected site.

getConnectedSitesId.title: Get connected site
getConnectedSitesId.description: Get information about a specific connected site.

deleteConnectedSitesId.title: Delete connected site
deleteConnectedSitesId.description: Remove a connected site from your Mailchimp account.

postConnectedSitesIdActionsVerifyScriptI.title: Verify connected site script
postConnectedSitesIdActionsVerifyScriptI.description: Verify that the connected sites script has been installed, either via the script URL or fragment.

getConversations.title: List conversations
getConversations.description: Get a list of conversations for the account.

getConversationsId.title: Get conversation
getConversationsId.description: Get details about an individual conversation.

getConversationsIdMessages.title: List messages
getConversationsIdMessages.description: Get messages from a specific conversation.

postConversationsIdMessages.title: Post message
postConversationsIdMessages.description: Post a new message to a conversation.

getConversationsIdMessagesId.title: Get message
getConversationsIdMessagesId.description: Get an individual message in a conversation.

postCustomerJourneysJourneysIdStepsIdAct.title: Trigger an API3.0 Customer Journey trigger.
postCustomerJourneysJourneysIdStepsIdAct.description: Trigger an API3.0 Customer Journey trigger.

getFileManagerFiles.title: List stored files
getFileManagerFiles.description: Get a list of available images and files stored in the File Manager for the account.

postFileManagerFiles.title: Add file
postFileManagerFiles.description: Upload a new image or file to the File Manager.

getFileManagerFilesId.title: Get file
getFileManagerFilesId.description: Get information about a specific file in the File Manager.

patchFileManagerFilesId.title: Update file
patchFileManagerFilesId.description: Update a file in the File Manager.

deleteFileManagerFilesId.title: Delete file
deleteFileManagerFilesId.description: Remove a specific file from the File Manager.

getFileManagerFolders.title: List folders
getFileManagerFolders.description: Get a list of all folders in the File Manager.

postFileManagerFolders.title: Add folder
postFileManagerFolders.description: Create a new folder in the File Manager.

getFileManagerFoldersId.title: Get folder
getFileManagerFoldersId.description: Get information about a specific folder in the File Manager.

patchFileManagerFoldersId.title: Update folder
patchFileManagerFoldersId.description: Update a specific File Manager folder.

deleteFileManagerFoldersId.title: Delete folder
deleteFileManagerFoldersId.description: Delete a specific folder in the File Manager.

getLists.title: Get lists info
getLists.description: Get information about all lists in the account.

postLists.title: Add list
postLists.description: Create a new list in your Mailchimp account.

getListsId.title: Get list info
getListsId.description: Get information about a specific list in your Mailchimp account. Results include list members who have signed up but haven't confirmed their subscription yet and unsubscribed or cleaned.

patchListsId.title: Update lists
patchListsId.description: Update the settings for a specific list.

deleteListsId.title: Delete list
deleteListsId.description: Delete a list from your Mailchimp account. If you delete a list, you'll lose the list history--including subscriber activity, unsubscribes, complaints, and bounces. You'll also lose subscribers' email addresses, unless you exported and backed up your list.

postListsId.title: Batch subscribe or unsubscribe
postListsId.description: Batch subscribe or unsubscribe list members.

getListsIdAbuseReports.title: List abuse reports
getListsIdAbuseReports.description: Get all abuse reports for a specific list.

getListsIdAbuseReportsId.title: Get abuse report
getListsIdAbuseReportsId.description: Get details about a specific abuse report.

getListsIdActivity.title: List recent activity
getListsIdActivity.description: Get up to the previous 180 days of daily detailed aggregated activity stats for a list, not including Automation activity.

getListsIdClients.title: List top email clients
getListsIdClients.description: Get a list of the top email clients based on user-agent strings.

getListsIdGrowthHistory.title: List growth history data
getListsIdGrowthHistory.description: Get a month-by-month summary of a specific list's growth activity.

getListsIdGrowthHistoryId.title: Get growth history by month
getListsIdGrowthHistoryId.description: Get a summary of a specific list's growth activity for a specific month and year.

getListsIdInterestCategories.title: List interest categories
getListsIdInterestCategories.description: Get information about a list's interest categories.

getListsIdInterestCategoriesId.title: Get interest category info
getListsIdInterestCategoriesId.description: Get information about a specific interest category.

getListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterests.title: List interests in category
getListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterests.description: Get a list of this category's interests.

postListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterests.title: Add interest in category
postListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterests.description: Create a new interest or 'group name' for a specific category.

getListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterestsI.title: Get interest in category
getListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterestsI.description: Get interests or 'group names' for a specific category.

patchListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterest.title: Update interest in category
patchListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInterest.description: Update interests or 'group names' for a specific category.

deleteListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInteres.title: Delete interest in category
deleteListsIdInterestCategoriesIdInteres.description: Delete interests or group names in a specific category.

previewASegment.title: List segments
previewASegment.description: Get information about all available segments for a specific list.

postListsIdSegments.title: Add segment
postListsIdSegments.description: Create a new segment in a specific list.

getListsIdSegmentsId.title: Get segment info
getListsIdSegmentsId.description: Get information about a specific segment.

deleteListsIdSegmentsId.title: Delete segment
deleteListsIdSegmentsId.description: Delete a specific segment in a list.

patchListsIdSegmentsId.title: Update segment
patchListsIdSegmentsId.description: Update a specific segment in a list.

postListsIdSegmentsId.title: Batch add or remove members
postListsIdSegmentsId.description: Batch add/remove list members to static segment

getListsIdSegmentsIdMembers.title: List members in segment
getListsIdSegmentsIdMembers.description: Get information about members in a saved segment.

postListsIdSegmentsIdMembers.title: Add member to segment
postListsIdSegmentsIdMembers.description: Add a member to a static segment.

deleteListsIdSegmentsIdMembersId.title: Remove list member from segment
deleteListsIdSegmentsIdMembersId.description: Remove a member from the specified static segment.

getListsIdMembers.title: List members info
getListsIdMembers.description: Get information about members in a specific Mailchimp list.

postListsIdMembers.title: Add member to list
postListsIdMembers.description: Add a new member to the list.

previewSegment.title: Preview segment
previewSegment.description: Preview a segment of users by sending conditions.

getListsIdMembersId.title: Get member info
getListsIdMembersId.description: Get information about a specific list member, including a currently subscribed, unsubscribed, or bounced member.

putListsIdMembersId.title: Add or update list member
putListsIdMembersId.description: Add or update a list member.

patchListsIdMembersId.title: Update list member
patchListsIdMembersId.description: Update information for a specific list member.

deleteListsIdMembersId.title: Archive list member
deleteListsIdMembersId.description: Archive a list member. To permanently delete, use the delete-permanent action.

getListsIdMembersIdActivity.title: View recent activity 50
getListsIdMembersIdActivity.description: Get the last 50 events of a member's activity on a specific list, including opens, clicks, and unsubscribes.

getListsIdMembersIdActivityFeed.title: View recent activity 10
getListsIdMembersIdActivityFeed.description: Get the last 10 events of a member's activity on a specific list, including opens, clicks, and unsubscribes.

getListMemberTags.title: List member tags
getListMemberTags.description: Get the tags on a list member.

postListMemberTags.title: Add or remove member tags
postListMemberTags.description: Add or remove tags from a list member. If a tag that does not exist is passed in and set as 'active', a new tag will be created.

postListMemberEvents.title: Add event
postListMemberEvents.description: Add an event for a list member.

getListsIdMembersIdGoals.title: List member goal events
getListsIdMembersIdGoals.description: Get the last 50 Goal events for a member on a specific list.

getListsIdMembersIdNotes.title: List recent member notes
getListsIdMembersIdNotes.description: Get recent notes for a specific list member.

postListsIdMembersIdNotes.title: Add member note
postListsIdMembersIdNotes.description: Add a new note for a specific subscriber.

getListsIdMembersIdNotesId.title: Get member note
getListsIdMembersIdNotesId.description: Get a specific note for a specific list member.

patchListsIdMembersIdNotesId.title: Update note
patchListsIdMembersIdNotesId.description: Update a specific note for a specific list member.

deleteListsIdMembersIdNotesId.title: Delete note
deleteListsIdMembersIdNotesId.description: Delete a specific note for a specific list member.

postListsIdMembersHashActionsDeletePerma.title: Delete list member
postListsIdMembersHashActionsDeletePerma.description: Delete all personally identifiable information related to a list member, and remove them from a list. This will make it impossible to re-import the list member.

getListsIdMergeFields.title: List merge fields
getListsIdMergeFields.description: Get a list of all merge fields (formerly merge vars) for a list.

postListsIdMergeFields.title: Add merge field
postListsIdMergeFields.description: Add a new merge field for a specific list.

getListsIdMergeFieldsId.title: Get merge field
getListsIdMergeFieldsId.description: Get information about a specific merge field in a list.

patchListsIdMergeFieldsId.title: Update merge field
patchListsIdMergeFieldsId.description: Update a specific merge field in a list.

deleteListsIdMergeFieldsId.title: Delete merge field
deleteListsIdMergeFieldsId.description: Delete a specific merge field in a list.

getListsIdWebhooks.title: List webhooks
getListsIdWebhooks.description: Get information about all webhooks for a specific list.

postListsIdWebhooks.title: Add webhook
postListsIdWebhooks.description: Create a new webhook for a specific list.

getListsIdWebhooksId.title: Get webhook info
getListsIdWebhooksId.description: Get information about a specific webhook.

deleteListsIdWebhooksId.title: Delete webhook
deleteListsIdWebhooksId.description: Delete a specific webhook in a list.

patchListsIdWebhooksId.title: Update webhook
patchListsIdWebhooksId.description: Update the settings for an existing webhook.

getListsIdSignupForms.title: List signup forms
getListsIdSignupForms.description: Get signup forms for a specific list.

postListsIdSignupForms.title: Customize signup form
postListsIdSignupForms.description: Customize a list's default signup form.

getListsIdLocations.title: List locations
getListsIdLocations.description: Get the locations (countries) that the list's subscribers have been tagged to based on geocoding their IP address.

postAllLandingPages.title: Add landing page
postAllLandingPages.description: Create a new Mailchimp landing page.

getLandingPageId.title: Get landing page info
getLandingPageId.description: Get information about a specific page.

postLandingPageIdActionsPublish.title: Publish landing page
postLandingPageIdActionsPublish.description: Publish a landing page that is in draft, unpublished, or has been previously published and edited.

postLandingPageIdActionsUnpublish.title: Unpublish landing page
postLandingPageIdActionsUnpublish.description: Unpublish a landing page that is in draft or has been published.

getLandingPageIdContent.title: Get landing page content
getLandingPageIdContent.description: Get the the HTML for your landing page.

getReportsId.title: Get campaign report
getReportsId.description: Get report details for a specific sent campaign.

getReportsIdAbuseReportsId.title: List abuse reports
getReportsIdAbuseReportsId.description: Get a list of abuse complaints for a specific campaign.

getReportsIdAbuseReportsIdId.title: Get abuse report
getReportsIdAbuseReportsIdId.description: Get information about a specific abuse report for a campaign.

getReportsIdAdvice.title: List campaign feedback
getReportsIdAdvice.description: Get feedback based on a campaign's statistics. Advice feedback is based on campaign stats like opens, clicks, unsubscribes, bounces, and more.

getReportsIdClickDetails.title: List campaign details
getReportsIdClickDetails.description: Get information about clicks on specific links in your Mailchimp campaigns.

getReportsIdClickDetailsId.title: Get campaign link details
getReportsIdClickDetailsId.description: Get click details for a specific link in a campaign.

getReportsIdClickDetailsIdMembers.title: List clicked link subscribers
getReportsIdClickDetailsIdMembers.description: Get information about list members who clicked on a specific link in a campaign.

getReportsIdClickDetailsIdMembersId.title: Get clicked link subscriber
getReportsIdClickDetailsIdMembersId.description: Get information about a specific subscriber who clicked a link in a specific campaign.

getReportsIdOpenDetails.title: List campaign open details
getReportsIdOpenDetails.description: Get detailed information about any campaign emails that were opened by a list member.

getReportsIdOpenDetailsIdMembersId.title: Get opened campaign subscriber
getReportsIdOpenDetailsIdMembersId.description: Get information about a specific subscriber who opened a campaign.

getReportsIdDomainPerformance.title: List domain performance stats
getReportsIdDomainPerformance.description: Get statistics for the top-performing email domains in a campaign.

getReportsIdEepurl.title: List EepURL activity
getReportsIdEepurl.description: Get a summary of social activity for the campaign, tracked by EepURL.

getReportsIdEmailActivity.title: List email activity
getReportsIdEmailActivity.description: Get a list of member's subscriber activity in a specific campaign.

getReportsIdEmailActivityId.title: Get subscriber email activity
getReportsIdEmailActivityId.description: Get a specific list member's activity in a campaign including opens, clicks, and bounces.

getReportsIdLocations.title: List top open activities
getReportsIdLocations.description: Get top open locations for a specific campaign.

getReportsIdSentToId.title: Get campaign recipient info
getReportsIdSentToId.description: Get information about a specific campaign recipient.

getReportsIdSubReportsId.title: List child campaign reports
getReportsIdSubReportsId.description: Get a list of reports with child campaigns for a specific parent campaign.

getReportsIdUnsubscribed.title: List unsubscribed members
getReportsIdUnsubscribed.description: Get information about members who have unsubscribed from a specific campaign.

getReportsIdUnsubscribedId.title: Get unsubscribed member
getReportsIdUnsubscribedId.description: Get information about a specific list member who unsubscribed from a campaign.

getReportsIdEcommerceProductActivity.title: List campaign product activity
getReportsIdEcommerceProductActivity.description: Get breakdown of product activity for a campaign

getTemplates.title: List templates
getTemplates.description: Get a list of an account's available templates.

postTemplates.title: Add template
postTemplates.description: Create a new template for the account. Only Classic templates are supported.

getTemplatesId.description: Get information about a specific template.

getTemplatesIdDefaultContent.description: Get the sections that you can edit in a template, including each section's default content.
